description:
Bonobono has thought of a new word: "gaitsuka." He goes to tell Chipmunk, but they can`t figure out what it should mean. Bonobono and Chipmunk go to search for something that should be called a gaitsuka and they ask Raccoon, Fishing Cat and others. Will they be able to figure out a meaning for their new word?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Words Popped into My Head
